law.catch_line: Except as otherwise provided in §§ 5-305 and 5-306 of this subtitle for group annuity contracts an...
law.text: Except as otherwise provided in §§ 5-305 and 5-306 of this subtitle for group annuity contracts and pure endowment contracts issued before the operative date of the Maryland Standard Nonforfeiture Law for Life Insurance, §§ 5-304 through 5-312 of this subtitle apply only to policies and contracts issued on or after that operative date.
